mapper.select: SELECT detail.id AS "detailId", detail.fault_location AS "faultLocation", detail.appointment AS "appointment", device.`name` AS "deviceName", user.realname AS "enginerName", user.enterprise_id AS "enterpriseId", progress.`name` AS "currentProgress", progress.id AS "progressId", report.is_completed AS "isCompleted", (SELECT id FROM ic_progress_report WHERE work_order_detail_id = detail.id and progress_id = progress.id) AS "reportId" FROM ic_work_order_detail detail LEFT JOIN tb_device_number device ON device.id = detail.device_number LEFT JOIN sys_user user ON user.username = detail.service_engineer_name LEFT JOIN ic_work_order workOrder ON workOrder.id = detail.work_order_id LEFT JOIN ic_work_order_progress progress ON progress.id = detail.current_progress LEFT JOIN ic_progress_report report ON report.work_order_detail_id = detail.id AND report.progress_id = detail.current_progress WHERE workOrder.id = #{workOrderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ic_work_order_detail SET current_progress = #{currentProgress} WHERE work_order_id = #{workOrderId}
